translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぼんばーーーーーーーーー！！！！」
まだ、空が明るくなり始めたばかりの早朝――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was early morning, just as the sky had begun to brighten—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの部屋に、小さな影が潜入していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A small shadow had snuck into Rance's room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 寝ていたランスの上に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On top of the sleeping Rance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ナギが勢いつけてボディプレース。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nagi charged and did a body press.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この悪ガキ！　なにすんだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You little brat! What do you think you're doing!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 顔だけ上げてランスが叱り飛ばすが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance lifted only his face and scolded, but

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何故かナギはむしろ嬉しそうだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: for some reason, Nagi looked rather happy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほら、リセットも何してるの！
ナギはビシッと親指を立てた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nagi sharply gave a thumbs up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だー、二人揃って俺の上でごろごろすんな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, both of you, stop rolling around on top of me together!"
"You two are noisy from the morning."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「二人ともそろそろご飯の時間」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's time for you two to eat soon."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人は志津香に連れられて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The two were led away by Shizuka,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ばたばたと騒がしく部屋を出て行った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and noisily left the room with a commotion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふ、二人揃うと……威力倍増だな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh, when the two are together... their power doubles..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んーっ、私はお昼ご飯入りそうにないし……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, I probably won't be having lunch, so..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケーキにしよっかなー」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you eat too much, you'll get fat, you know?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウルザ達がゼスの喫茶店で食事をしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Urza and the others were having a meal at a cafe in Zeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「またこの三人ってのが不穏よねー。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And these three together are unsettling, you know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックとチョチョマンさんとナギがいたら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If Magic, Chochoman-san, and Nagi are here,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新旧ゼス四天王揃い踏みの超VIPじゃない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that's a super VIP gathering of the old and new Zeth Four Heavenly Kings."
